tool_description: Manage your FreeFloatUs portfolio, download trades and upload executions.
name: FreeFloatUs
title: FreeFloatUs

api_list.name: trades/pending
api_list.description: Get pending trades for your freefloat strategies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freefloatus.p.rapidapi.com/trades/pending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freefloatus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
